1.0.0.name: wordpress/smartpik
1.0.0.description:
SmartPik is image sharing made incredibly easy with strong social features and plenty of va va zoom. SmartPik is for website and blog publishers who want to promote their images and encourage their audience to share their content.

Images are enhanced with the SmartPik toolbar and real smarts are added like one-click sharing, zoomability, and embed anywhere. Don't forget to check out the example screenshot and the FAQ.

We would love to hear your thoughts and experience with SmartPik. Get in touch with us or stay in touch by following us on Twitter or Facebook :)
